entry_checkout_shipping_address: Use shipping address for billing address
entry_image_popup: Product Image Popup Size (W x H)
entry_image_thumb: Product Image Thumb Size (W x H)
error_address: Store Address must be between 3 and 256 characters!
error_complete_status: You must choose at least 1 order complete status
error_customer_group_display: You must include the default customer group if you are going to use this feature!
error_customer_online_expire: Timeout setting required for customer online list!
error_email: E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!
error_format_b: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the max file size: %s bytes!
error_format_gb: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the max file size: %s gigabytes!
error_format_kb: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the max file size: %s kilobytes!
error_format_mb: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the max file size: %s megabytes!
error_image_default: Product Image Default Size dimensions required!
error_image_popup: Product Image Popup Size dimensions required!
error_image_thumb: Product Image Thumb Size dimensions required!
error_login_attempts: Login Attempts must be greater than 0!
error_meta_title: Title must be between 1 and 64 characters!
error_name: Store Name must be between 3 and 32 characters!
error_owner: Store Owner must be between 3 and 64 characters!
error_permission: Warning: You do not have permission to modify settings!
error_processing_status: You must choose at least 1 order process status
error_session: Warning: Session has expired please submit the form again!
error_upload_1: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini!
error_upload_2: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form!
error_upload_3: Warning: The uploaded file was only partially uploaded!
error_upload_7: Warning: Failed to write file to disk!
error_upload_8: Warning: File upload stopped by extension!
error_upload_size: Warning: The uploaded file exceeds the %smb max file size!
error_user_2fa: Two-factor Security cannot be used if you do not have your email setup yet!
error_warning: Warning: Please check the form carefully for errors!
help_2fa_expire: Number of days until the token expires.
help_account: Forces people to agree to terms before an account can be created.
help_affiliate: Forces people to agree to terms before an affiliate account can be created.
help_affiliate_approval: Automatically approve any new affiliates who sign up.
help_affiliate_auto: Automatically add commission when each order reaches the complete status.
help_affiliate_status: If the affiliate system will not be used, you can disable it.
help_api: Default API user the admin should use.
help_article_description_length: In the list view, short article description character limit
help_autocomplete_limit: Determines how many lines are shown per autocomplete entry (filters, products, categories, etc)
help_captcha: Captcha to use for registration, login, contact and reviews.
help_cart_weight: Show the cart weight on the cart page.
help_checkout: Forces people to agree to terms before a customer can checkout.
help_checkout_guest: Allow customers to checkout without creating an account. This will not be available when a downloadable product is in the shopping cart.
help_checkout_payment_address: Choose if customers require a billing address for checkout.
help_checkout_shipping_address: If no billing address use shipping address for calculating which payment methods to use.
help_comment: This field is for any special notes you would like to tell the customer i.e. Store does not accept cheques.
help_comment_approve: Auto approve comments otherwise the first comment needs to be approved before they are added to a safe list.
help_comment_interval: Number of minutes before some one can make another comment after already commenting. Use 0 to turn off flood protection.
help_comment_status: Enable/Disable new comment entry and display of existing comments.
help_complete_status: Set the order status the customer's order must reach before they are allowed to access their downloadable products.
help_cookie: Display Cookie policy as part of the EU Law.
help_currency: Change the default currency. Clear your browser cache to see the change and reset your existing cookie.
help_currency_auto: Set your store to automatically update currencies daily.
help_customer_activity: Track customers activity via the customer reports section.
help_customer_group_display: Display customer groups that new customers can select to use such as wholesale and business when signing up.
help_customer_online: Track customers online via the customer reports section.
help_customer_online_expire: Enter for how long people who visit your site will be shown in customer online list.
help_customer_price: Only show prices when a customer is logged in.
help_error_display: Only turn on for development and turn off for production.
help_fraud_status: Set the fraud status when a customer is suspected of trying to alter the order payment details or use a coupon or reward points that have already been used.
help_gdpr: Enable GDPR features and link to the GDPR policy.
help_gdpr_limit: Limits the number of days before a personal data removal request is performed after its approved. Required for returns and chargebacks and fraud prevention.
help_icon: The icon should be a PNG that is 16px x 16px.
help_invoice_prefix: Set the invoice prefix (e.g. INV-2011-00). Invoice IDs will start at 1 for each unique prefix.
help_location: The different store locations you have that you want displayed on the contact us form.
help_login_attempts: Maximum login attempts allowed before the account is locked for 1 hour. Customer accounts can be unlocked on the customer admin pages.
help_mail_alert: Select which features you would like to receive an alert email on when a customer uses them.
help_mail_alert_email: Any additional emails you want to receive the alert email, in addition to the main store email. (comma separated).
help_mail_engine: Only choose 'Mail' unless your host has disabled the php mail function.
help_mail_parameter: When using 'Mail', additional mail parameters can be added here (e.g. -f email@storeaddress.com).
help_mail_smtp_hostname: Add 'tls://' or 'ssl://' prefix if security connection is required. (e.g. tls://smtp.gmail.com, ssl://smtp.gmail.com).
help_mail_smtp_password: For Gmail you might need to setup an application specific password here: https://security.google.com/settings/security/apppasswords.
help_maintenance: Prevents customers from browsing your store. They will instead see a maintenance message. If logged in as admin, you will see the store as normal.
help_open: Fill in your store's opening times.
help_order_status: Set the default order status when an order is processed.
help_pagination: Determines how many catalog items are shown per page (products, categories, etc)
help_processing_status: Set the order status the customer's order must reach before the order starts stock subtraction and coupon and rewards redemption.
help_product_category: Display products in each parent category.
help_product_count: Show the number of products inside the subcategories in the storefront header category menu. Be warned, this will cause an extreme performance hit for stores with a lot of subcategories!
help_product_description_length: In the list view, short description character limit (categories, special etc)
help_product_report: Report how many times a product is viewed. This can use up a lot of storage on high traffic sites.
help_return: Forces people to agree to terms before a return can be created.
help_return_status: Set the default return status when a return request is submitted.
help_review: Enable/Disable new review entry and display of existing reviews.
help_review_purchased: Reviews are only allowed for products the customer has purchased.
help_robots: A list of web crawler user agents that shared sessions will not be used with. Use separate lines for each user agent.
help_seo_url: To use SEO URLs, apache module mod-rewrite must be installed and you need to rename the htaccess.txt to .htaccess.
help_shared: Share the cart different stores on different domains.
help_stock_checkout: Allow customers to still checkout if the products they are ordering are not in stock.
help_stock_display: Display stock quantity on the product page.
help_stock_status: Set the default stock status when a product is available on stock.
help_stock_warning: Display out of stock message on the shopping cart page if a product is out of stock but stock checkout is yes. (Warning always shows if stock checkout is no)
help_subscription: Set the default subscription status when a customer is suspected of trying to alter the order payment details or use a coupon or reward points that have already been used.
help_tax_customer: Use the customer's default address when they login to calculate taxes. You can choose to use the default address for the customer's shipping or payment address.
help_tax_default: Use the store address to calculate taxes if customer is not logged in. You can choose to use the store address for the customer's shipping or payment address.
